content: right k - knit ktbl/ktbl ctl - sl1 onto cn and hold in front ktbl then ktbl from the cn ktbl/ktbl ctr - sl1 onto cn and hold to back ktbl then ktbl from the cn ktbl/p ctl - sl1 onto cn and hold in front p1 then ktbl from the cn ktbl/p ctr - sl1 onto cn and hold to back ktbl then p1 from the cn k2tog - knit 2 stitches together m1pr - make 1 purl stitch leaning right p - purl p2tog - purl 2 stitches together round s - round s rs - right side sl - slip ssk - slip slip knit st s - stitch es ws - wrong side lady-in-waiting socks page 4/9 chart a back of the leg all sizes lady-in-waiting socks page 5/9 chart b front of the leg all sizes lady-in-waiting socks page 6/9 chart c1 front of the leg / instep size s lady-in-waiting socks page 7/9 chart c2 front of the leg / instep size m lady-in-waiting socks page 8/9 chart c3 front of the leg / instep size l lady-in-waiting socks page 9/9
